## CameraMoveUpdateEvent interface

Event: Fired on every tick of CameraRig's transition

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CameraMoveUpdateEvent 
```

## Example


```javascript
rig.addEventListener('CameraMoveUpdate', handlerFunction)

```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [progress](./controls.cameramoveupdateevent.progress.md) | number | Percentage of transition completed, between 0 and 1. |
|  [type](./controls.cameramoveupdateevent.type.md) | 'CameraMoveUpdate' |  |
